downloadTitle: System Center 2022 Integration Pack for Exchange User
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for Exchange User is an add-on for System Center 2022 Orchestrator that enables you to facilitate the automation of user centric tasks, such as sending e-mail messages, creating appointments and updating tasks
detailsSection:
Release History
  • 06/30/2022 - version 10.22.2.1, Original English release
  • 06/11/2024 - version 10.22.2.20, Support added for Private and Gov clouds
systemRequirementsSection:
• System Center 2022 - Orchestrator
  • Windows Server 2019 or higher
  • Microsoft Exchange 2010 Service Pack 1 or Microsoft Exchange 2013 or Microsoft Exchange Online/Microsoft 365
  • .NET Framework 4.0 or higher (.NET 4.7.2 recommended)
  • RAM – minimum 1GB (recommended 2GB)
  • Disk space minimum 200MB
  • CPU Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: Download the .oip file, register the Integration Pack in Deployment Manager and then deploy the Integration Pack on Runbook Designer and Runbook Server.
